mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email ( mail_id, category, sender, sender_id, title, file_id, contents, recipient, recipient_id, disable_yn, read ) VALUES ( 'M' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || '_' || mail_id.NEXTVAL, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disableYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{read,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.*,T2.* FROM( SELECT B.mail_id as mailId, B.category, B.sender, B.sender_id as senderId, B.title, B.file_id as fileId, DECODE(TO_CHAR(B.rec_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(B.rec_date,'HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(B.rec_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) as recDate, B.disable_yn as disableYn, B.read, rnum as num FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM email WHERE 1=1 --검색조건 AND recipient_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' AND disable_yn = 'N' ORDER BY TO_CHAR(rec_date,'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') DESC )A --10 WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} *(#{pageNum} - 1) + #{pageSize}) )B --1 WHERE B.RNUM >= (#{pageSize}*(#{pageNum}-1)+1) )T1 CROSS JOIN ( SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM email WHERE 1=1 --검색조건 AND recipient_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' AND disable_yn = 'N' )T2

SELECT T1.*,T2.* FROM( SELECT B.mail_id as mailId, B.category, B.recipient, B.recipient_id as recipientId, B.sender, B.sender_id as senderId, B.title, B.file_id as fileId, DECODE(TO_CHAR(B.rec_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(B.rec_date,'HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(B.rec_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) as recDate, B.disable_yn as disableYn, B.read, rnum as num FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM email WHERE 1=1 --검색조건 AND sender_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' ORDER BY TO_CHAR(rec_date,'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') DESC )A --10 WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} *(#{pageNum} - 1) + #{pageSize}) )B --1 WHERE B.RNUM >= (#{pageSize}*(#{pageNum}-1)+1) )T1 CROSS JOIN ( SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM email WHERE 1=1 --검색조건 AND sender_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' )T2

SELECT T1.*,T2.* FROM( SELECT B.mail_id as mailId, B.category, B.sender, B.sender_id as senderId, B.title, B.file_id as fileId, DECODE(TO_CHAR(B.rec_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(B.rec_date,'HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(B.rec_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) as recDate, B.disable_yn as disableYn, B.read, rnum as num FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM email WHERE 1=1 --검색조건 AND recipient_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' AND disable_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY TO_CHAR(rec_date,'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') DESC )A --10 WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} *(#{pageNum} - 1) + #{pageSize}) )B --1 WHERE B.RNUM >= (#{pageSize}*(#{pageNum}-1)+1) )T1 CROSS JOIN ( SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM email WHERE 1=1 --검색조건 AND recipient_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' AND disable_yn = 'Y' )T2

SELECT mail_id as mailId, category, title, DECODE(TO_CHAR(rec_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),TO_CHAR(rec_date,'HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(rec_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) as recDate, sender, sender_id as senderId, recipient, recipient_id as recipientId, file_id as fileId, contents, disable_yn as disableYn FROM email WHERE mail_id = #{mailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT mail_id as mailId, category, sender, sender_id as senderId, sen_date as senDate, title, file_id as fileId, contents, recipient, recipient_id as recipientId, TO_CHAR(rec_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as recDate, disable_yn as disableYn, read FROM email WHERE recipient_id like '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' AND disable_yn = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(rec_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - (interval '30' minute),'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')
